name: antsama
text: Roast Beef NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

name: kazad
text: wow but your avatar goes so well with your comment...Batman mourns RB

name: straw
text: Though I liked antsama's response, I wasn't going to give it a chubby until I read yours.  Good on, kazad, good on

name: unsentletter
text:
> Though I liked antsama's response, I wasn't going to give it a chubby until I read yours. Good on, kazad, good on

Interesting! And true!

Henceforth this phenomenon may be referred to as " straw's Cascading Chubby Effect ."

Yep.

name: straw
text: I've never had an effect named after me.  This is exciting! I can't wait to tell mother.

name: kamet
text: [I]And the Nobel Prize goes to.. Straw! For the patented "Straw's Cascading Chubby Effect.  We certainly look forward to seeing more from this exciting llama.[I]

name: kamet
text: Bummer. My first attempt, foiled.

name: hereward
text: The other cool thing is that chubbies have filtered down through this thread in precise descending order.

name: prettyrad
text: Well... I'm going to go all out for the one chubby I deserve for this post. 4-3-2-0 looks so ugly.

name: lightupafatty
text:
you got it pal.
no one dare chubby me.

name: njury
text: You obliviously shouldn't have said that.

name: ganymedeio
text: Oh dang, oh dang, Gravy Train.

name: soticoto
text: Worry not. I'm disliked enough to put a stop to this.

name: anzio
text: That was legitimately funny. Thank you.

name: soticoto
text: ... Ah yes. I forgot the first law of Assetboard dynamics: Trying to use my lame-magnetism for good does not work.

name: intergalactic_
text: You get runner up for your fantastic avatar.

name: wite_rabit
text: Here comes a special boy!

name: saint
text: Domino's Crazy Stix going down the wrong pipe are the leading cause of death in cartoon characters...that and gunshot wounds.

name: homepie
text: Roast Beef is DEAAAAAD!

name: ted0phile
text: Whoever lamed this doesn't understand the reference.

name: kingofshell
text: Holy shit!

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by SSDDR, Connellingus, Darthemed)

name: iloveyoucupcake
text: I hope that you are always around to initiate this song when Beef gets shot

name: catachresis
text: I trust you have been watching that SNL thing

name: laserblade
text:
Mmm whatcha say
Mmm that it's all for the best
Of course it is

name: rowboat
text:
I hate you for introducing me to this, Deimosrising. I put a lot of effort into avoiding network television, "youtube sensations," and internet memes in general. But I saw your comment and the responses to it, and I got curious. Now I'm filled with disgust and, for some reason, I'm focusing the blame on you.

That is all.

name: sp1derbaby
text: I got curious too but watching that video made the next strip pretty hilarious so here's a ruined-the-tragedy Chubby.

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ezcmac, professorhazard, goocifer, mortshire, farqussus, HNimrod)

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ezcmac, mikekitchell, goocifer, farqussus, HNimrod, cailetshadow)

name: junko
text: I cannot get a fix on what Emeril's speech pattern is supposed to sound like.

name: aaron_haynes
text: I'm hearing a much-less raspy Marlon Brando as Don Corleone.

name: andrew_
text: and lower on the register.

name: rowboat
text: I'm not sure what a Melungeon sounds like, but as they are necessarily Appalachian by ancestry there can be no doubt that Brando sails fairly wide of the mark.

name: snowman
text: I'm gettin' kind of like a Creole thing.

name: riazm
text: My man R.B lives life with the blinds pulled.

name: buttermoths
text: Is this the first major death not accompanied by a rollerskate?

name: jthm_guitarist
text: Except every other times Beef died.

name: buttermoths
text: O RLY?

name: ctrl_z
text: Poor Beef, not again.

name: charchar
text:
Quick! To the operating theatre and steady with the nitrous oxide. Don't coddle it, man, we have but moments before gangrene sets in! (

(The antebellum-pistol wound is like a time machine for doctors.)

name: dorothypoopbot
text: WHERE IS THE ROLLER SKATE?!

name: daaaaang
text: It's right behind you.  Now, stay calm and don't--NO! DON'T TURN AROU-

name: jianna
text: DAAAAAAAANG IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIT

name: skaterpix
text: NOT ROAST BEEF!

name: paby
text: "off his halves"

name: mrectomy
text:
So would this be the...fourth time RB gets shot? I believe he's shot once before and in his email to his mom he mentions another time he was shot. Then Pat shoots him while he's hold up Vlad at subway.

Sucks for Roast Beef...

name: mikeronomicon
text: Poor RB. If I got shot as many times as that poor bastard, I'd want to die too.

name: chexmix
text: melungeon!

name: carlyle
text: How many times does he get shot?

name: fattypneumonia
text: Heh... Chickenhead = 5

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Dammit , Beef. Quit dying.

name: griffypoo
text: Man, you'd think he would learn to just stop rushing through doors at some point.
